lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization said Saturday that there was no public health justification for postponing or canceling the Rio Summer Olympics over the Zika virus.

headline.print_headline: U.N. Health Agency Dismisses Call to Move Olympics Over Zika Virus in Brazil
headline.main: W.H.O. Dismisses Call to Move Olympics Over Zika Virus in Brazil

snippet: The World Health Organization said Saturday that there was no public health justification for postponing or canceling the Rio Summer Olympics over the Zika virus.
abstract: World Health Organization denies plea from 150 health experts asking it to delay or move location of Olympics Games due to outbreak of Zika virus in Brazil.
